alert.note: Alert for Coshocton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 7:28PM EDT until July 24 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Coshocton County in east central Ohio... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 727 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Coshocton, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Coshocton, West Lafayette, Chili, and Bakersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
